description.narrative: For Partner Grant: Biowatch's aim is to publicize, monitor and research issues concerning genetic engineering and to promote biodiversity, biosafety, food sovereignty and social justice. To achieve this goal, the IDEX grant will be used to strengthen Biowatch as organization and to support the community work in the province of Kwa-Zulu Natal focusing on agro-ecology, achieving household food security, facilitating market access and raising issues about the impacts of industrial agriculture and GMOs. In addition, emphasis on leadership development and decision-making skills within the community to increase and support the participation of community members. Biowatch will attempt to improve its networking and advocacy at the provincial and national level
